typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Latitude as decimal(10,5),
		Longitude as decimal(10,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Region
source(output(
		CountryKey as integer,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Latitude as decimal(10,5),
		Longitude as decimal(10,5),
		InsertedDT as timestamp,
		UpdateDT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Target
Region, Target lookup(Region@CountryCode == Target@CountryCode,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(CountryCode, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTarget
Selectop keyGenerate(output(CountryKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeycustomerkey
LookupTarget derive(output_CountryKey = CountryKey,
		output_Country = iif(Region@Country== "",Target@Country,Region@Country),
		output_countrycode = iif(Region@CountryCode=="",Target@CountryCode,Region@CountryCode),
		output_Latitude = iif(Region@Latitude==0,Target@Latitude,Region@Latitude),
		output_Longitude = iif(Region@Longitude==0,Target@Longitude,Region@Longitude),
		output_InsertedDT = iif(isNull(Target@CountryCode),currentTimestamp(),InsertedDT),
		output_UpdateDT = iif(Region@Country!=Target@Country || Region@Latitude != Target@Latitude || Region@Longitude !=Target@Longitude, currentTimestamp(),UpdateDT)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Country = output_Country,
		CountryCode = output_countrycode,
		Latitude = output_Latitude,
		Longitude = output_Longitude,
		CountryKey,
		InsertedDT = output_InsertedDT,
		UpdateDT = output_UpdateDT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectop
SurrogateKeycustomerkey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CountryKey as integer,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Latitude as decimal(10,5),
		Longitude as decimal(10,5),
		InsertedDT as timestamp,
		UpdateDT as timestamp
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['region.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CountryKey,
		Country,
		CountryCode,
		Latitude,
		Longitude,
		InsertedDT,
		UpdateDT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ODSRegionTarget
